info.description:
The OpenBazaar networking daemon combines a Kademlia DHT, IPFS node, Bitcoin wallet, and a peer-to-peer contracting system.
The JSON API is the primary mechanism for controlling the node. It offers a RESTful api for building user interfaces as well
as a number of RPC calls.
info.title: OpenBazaar JSON API.
info.termsOfService: There are no TOS at this moment, use at your own risk we take no responsibility

post.description: RPC call to follow a peer
